disable $LOCALIZE[15067] Dialog.Close(all)
!String.IsEmpty(Container(10051).ListItem.DBID) + !String.IsEmpty(Container(10051).ListItem.Property(file)) + !String.IsEqual(Container(10051).ListItem.Property(call),tv) play $LOCALIZE[208] PlayMedia($INFO[Container(10051).ListItem.Property(file)]) Dialog.Close(all)
!String.IsEmpty(Container(10051).ListItem.DBID) + String.IsEqual(Container(10051).ListItem.Property(call),tv) browse $LOCALIZE[1024] Dialog.Close(all) ActivateWindow(videos,videodb://tvshows/titles/$INFO[Container(10051).ListItem.DBID]/,return) Container.Update(videodb://tvshows/titles/$INFO[Container(10051).ListItem.DBID]/)
!String.IsEmpty(Container(10051).ListItem.Plot) plot $LOCALIZE[207] RunScript(script.embuary.info,call=textviewer,header='$ESCINFO[Container(10051).ListItem.Label]',message='$ESCINFO[Container(10051).ListItem.Plot]')
